trans-unit.source: Represents a control that raises its <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"></xref> event repeatedly from the time it is pressed until it is released.
trans-unit.target: 表示引发一个控件其<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"></xref>重复从按下它将被释放之前的时间的事件。

trans-unit.source: A RepeatButton is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, which means that it can contain a single object of any type (such as a string, an image, or a panel).
trans-unit.target: RepeatButton 是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>，这意味着，它可以包含任何类型 （如字符串、 一个映像或一个面板） 的单个对象。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>类。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>

trans-unit.source: The RepeatButton class represents a control that is similar to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: RepeatButton 类表示一个控件，类似于一种<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: However, repeat buttons give you control over when and how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 但是，重复按下按钮的使你能够控制何时以及如何<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>事件发生。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>

trans-unit.source: The RepeatButton raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event repeatedly from the time it is pressed until it is released.
trans-unit.target: RepeatButton 引发<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>重复从按下它将被释放之前的时间的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> property determines when the event begins.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>属性确定该事件时开始。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also control the interval of the repetitions with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Interval%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以控制的使用重复的间隔<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Interval%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Interval%2A>

trans-unit.source: Customizing the RepeatButton Control To apply the same property settings to multiple RepeatButton controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: RepeatButton 控件到自定义适用于多个 RepeatButton 控件，使用的相同的属性设置<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 你可以修改默认<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>提供独特外观的控制。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the RepeatButton, see [RepeatButton Syles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要查看的部件和特定于 RepeatButton 的状态，请参阅[RepeatButton Syles 和模板](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 对于此控件的依赖项属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果属性设置的默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值，如果控件出现在应用程序中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 桌面主题用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in Button control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 设置 visual 属性仅会产生作用如果该属性既存在按钮控件的默认模板中，通过设置。

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: 可以在的"更改 Visual 结构的控件"一节中找到的可视属性列表[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of time, in milliseconds, the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> waits while it is pressed before it starts repeating.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的时间，以毫秒为单位， <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref>等待它开始重复之前按下时。

trans-unit.source: The value must be non-negative.
trans-unit.target: 值必须为非负数。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The amount of time, in milliseconds, the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> waits while it is pressed before it starts repeating.
trans-unit.target: 时间，以毫秒为单位， <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref>等待它开始重复之前按下时。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.KeyboardDelay%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是值<xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.KeyboardDelay%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of time, in milliseconds, between repeats once repeating starts.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的时间，以毫秒为单位，之间开始重复后重复。

trans-unit.source: The value must be non-negative.
trans-unit.target: 值必须为非负数。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The amount of time, in milliseconds, between repeats after repeating starts.
trans-unit.target: 时间，以毫秒为单位，量之间开始重复后重复。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.KeyboardSpeed%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是值<xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.KeyboardSpeed%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Interval*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Interval*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Interval*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Raises an automation event and calls the base method to raise the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发自动化事件和调用基方法，以引发<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Provides an appropriate <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RepeatButtonAutomationPeer"></xref> implementation for this control, as part of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 提供适当<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RepeatButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>实现此控件，作为的一部分[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]基础结构。

trans-unit.source: The type-specific <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 特定于类型的<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref>实现。

trans-unit.source: Responds to the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 响应<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.target: 事件的事件数据<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.target: 时调用<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref>丢失鼠标捕获。

trans-unit.target: 事件的事件数据<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostMouseCapture"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Reports when the mouse enters an element.
trans-unit.target: 当鼠标进入某个元素时报告。

trans-unit.target: 事件的事件数据<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.target: 事件的事件数据<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.target: 响应<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"></xref>事件。
